Articles.Content:
I've been trying to use Imgur to upload pictures to my mission report, but every time I open Imgur, the website is just a blank white screen.

It's been like this for over a week now. Is this a known issue?

Imgur is notorious for breaking down completely 3-4 times per year. Try logging out of your account, closing the window entirely, open a new window, and log in again. This fixes many Imgur problems. (Working for me, by the way.)

7 minutes ago, Vanamonde said:

Imgur is notorious for breaking down completely 3-4 times per year. Try logging out of your account, closing the window entirely, open a new window, and log in again. This fixes many Imgur problems. (Working for me, by the way.) 

I'm not sure that that would work, but either way, Imgur has just started working again. Either way, thanks for the help!
